scripts.run-demo: pnpm --filter @metaving/core build && pnpm --filter @metaving/cli build && pnpm --filter @metaving/playground-basic dev
scripts.build-demo: pnpm --filter @metaving/core build && pnpm --filter @metaving/cli build && pnpm --filter @metaving/playground-basic build
scripts.export-demo: pnpm --filter @metaving/core build && pnpm --filter @metaving/cli build && pnpm --filter @metaving/playground-basic export
